name: Slots Street
description:
A quality video slots game has arrived at your smartphone!

------------------------------------------
What is a video slots?
------------------------------------------
Those are slots that you can easily play just by pressing a spin button.
It features a variety of scenarios using multiples lively images.
Also, since you can choose the number of bets freely, easy to compete according to the number of coins you have.
Furthermore, simulation of the real Las Vegas made the game become the best of them all!

------------------------------------------
What is Slots Street?
------------------------------------------
▼Casino mode
Compete ranking with other players in "Tournament", and look for your big win in "Jackpot" are now all set!
Bring the FULL Casino experience, THRILL with every spins wherever whenever you want!

▼Adventure mode
The typical simple type, Quest Game. Clear progress map by completing all quests of video slots. Get lucky, use your technique to aim for all clear!
